content.question: Vergil announces his theme. Arma virumque cano, Troiae qui primus ab orisora, orae, f.: shore, coast. Italiam, fato profugus,profugus, -a, -um: fleeing, exiledLaviniaqueLavinius, -a, -um: Lavinian, of the city Lavinium venit litora,litus, litoris, n.: shore, coast multum ille et terris iactatusiacto, -are: toss, et alto vi superum= superorum saevae memoremmemor, -oris: mindful, unforgetting Iunonis ob iram. Aeneid 1.1-4 Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
